title: Job Vacancies at Solution Impact Global Resources
content:
Solution Impact Global Resources - Our client, a renowned multi-specialty one-stop healthcare provider is recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Billing Officer

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Slot: 4 Openings

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Prepare, review, and issue patient bills accurately and promptly
	Ensure proper documentation of services rendered
	Liaise with medical and administrative staff to reconcile billing records
	Maintain confidentiality and compliance with hospital policies
	Provide clear communication to patients regarding billing inquiries


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or related field
	Prior experience in hospital billing or healthcare finance is an advantage
	Strong attention to detail and numerical accuracy
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and billing software.


Benefits


	Competitive salary package
	Opportunity to work in reputable healthcare institutions
	Professional growth and career development


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to: solutionimpactglobalresources@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Laboratory Technician

Job Location: Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Slots: 10 Openings

Requirements


	Relevant qualifications and certifications
	Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in the applied role
	Commitment to mission-driven healthcare
	Strong interpersonal and teamwork skills
	Excellent work ethic and integrity.


Competitive Pay
We offer competitive remuneration packages that recognize your experience and dedication.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Applications to: solutionimpactglobalresources@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Certified Pharmacy Technician

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Slot: 4 Openings

Responsibilities


	Assist the pharmacist with daily dispensing.
	Counseling patients on drug use.
	Ensure medications are properly arranged on the shelves.
	Requisition of drugs from the pharmacy store
	Proper documentation of all dispensing.
	Filling and balancing of bin cards.
	Daily record of out-of-stock medications in various dispensaries.
	Preparation of daily reports.
	Stock taking.
	Checking and reporting of drug expiry dates in various dispensaries.
	Follow up with patients on outstanding medications.
	Ensure departmental cleanliness and hygiene.


Requirements


	Pharmacy Technician certification and license.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Applications to: solutionimpactglobalresources@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

	Very detailed and not easily distracted
